user.title: Rademacher DuoFern USB-Stick
user.description: Configure the connection to your DuoFern USB stick.

data_description.serial_port: The serial port path of the DuoFern USB stick (e.g. /dev/ttyUSB0).
data_description.system_code: The 6-digit hex code of your DuoFern system (starts with 6F, e.g. 6F1A2B). This is the dongle serial number.

devices.title: Paired Devices
devices.description: Enter the 6-digit hex codes of your paired DuoFern devices, separated by commas.

data_description.paired_devices: Comma-separated list of 6-digit hex device codes (e.g. 406B0D, 4090EA, 40B689). These are the codes of your roller shutters and other DuoFern devices.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the DuoFern stick. Check the serial port path.
error.invalid_system_code: Invalid system code. Must be 6 hex digits starting with 6F.
error.invalid_device_code: One or more device codes are invalid. Each must be exactly 6 hex digits.
error.no_devices: Please enter at least one device code.

abort.already_configured: This DuoFern stick is already configured.

init.title: DuoFern Paired Devices
init.description: Edit the list of paired DuoFern device codes. The integration will reload after saving.

data_description.paired_devices: Comma-separated list of 6-digit hex device codes (e.g. 406B0D, 4090EA, 40B689).
